content.content:
`.products.customizations`

The **customizations** is a subresource of *products* resource,
use it to create, read, update and delete customization fields of a specific product by ID

meta.description: Tag to identify object, use only lowercase letters, digits and underscore - Max length: **20** - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-z0-9_]+$`**
Title for this customization field, can be the grid title - Max length: **70**
If this field is related to a grid, put the `grid_id` - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-z0-9_]{2,30}$`**
If field is required (true), customer must always choose a value
Pre-defined options for this customization field, `option_id` as property name - Min properties: **1** - Max properties: **200**
Option text value displayed for the client - Max length: **70**
Option color palette (if the field involves colors), starting by main color - Max elements: **4**
Specific price alteration if customer choose this option
Additional value, could be negative - Mininum: **-99999999** - Maximum: **99999999** - Max precision: **0.0001**
If this field accept custom value defined by customer
If this field accept customer file attachment
Default (to all options) price alteration if customer use this field
Additional value, could be negative - Mininum: **-99999999** - Maximum: **99999999** - Max precision: **0.0001**

content.content:
*/products/[_id]/customizations.json?limit&offset&sort&fields\&[field]* > Authentication
_GET_: **required** Use [default URL parameters](#introduction/overview/url-params) (metadata) for pagination and ordering, you can use any other parameter to query by particular object properties

*/products/[_id]/customizations.json* > Authentication
_POST_: **required** Request body must obey the specifications of [this model](#reference/product-customizations/product-field-object)

*/products/[_id]/customizations/[_id].json* > Authentication
_GET_, _PATCH_, _DELETE_: **required** In read requests, response body will follow [this model](#reference/product-customizations/product-field-object) For editing, request body must obey the same specifications, but there are no required fields, object should have at least one valid property
